channel.title: Making sara brews pots
channel.description:
you how back in the day u could brew shark (drink a brew and eat a shark at the same time)
You can do this on mopar as well with anti posisons, and such but not brews.
Does any one know of a way to make brews/other pots eat as pots?

item.title: Making sara brews pots
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I would help you, But what you said about my server change’s my mind. You didn’t even give me 1 rep. Maybe be a little nicer and all help. I’m pro with pot’s.

-Deni

Read full topic
